title: A Good Old Fashioned Dad Issue (feat. Joe List)
description:
Joe List joins The Bonfire as he gets ready for the premier of the new film "4th of July" that he co-wrote and starred in and Ron Bennington swings by the studio!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com
